trans-unit.source: Represents a tabular data source view on XML data for an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una vista origine dati in formato tabulare sui dati XML per un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control can present its underlying data in both tabular and hierarchical format to Web server controls that bind to it.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>controllo può presentare i dati sottostanti in formato tabulare o gerarchico ai controlli server Web che associare piace</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> to bind to XML data and present it in list or tabular form, while controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, bind to XML data and present it in hierarchical form.
trans-unit.target: I controlli come <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>per associare ai dati XML e presentarli in formato tabulare o di elenco, mentre i controlli che derivano dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, vengono associati ai dati XML e presentarli in modo gerarchico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> creates each view type internally through different code paths.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>Crea ogni tipo di visualizzazione internamente tramite i percorsi del codice diversi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>, an XmlDataSourceView is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>metodo viene chiamato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>viene creato un XmlDataSourceView da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method is called, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> is created.

The XmlDataSourceView class is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and bind to lists and tabular data, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> and bind to hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: La classe XmlDataSourceView viene fornita per i controlli server Web che derivano da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>e associare gli elenchi e dati tabulari, mentre il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView>viene fornito per i controlli server Web che derivano da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>e associati a dati gerarchici.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Internally, all data-bound control methods call the `Select` method on whichever data source view object is returned.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, tutti i metodi di controllo con associazione a dati chiamano il `Select` metodo su cui viene restituito qualsiasi oggetto di vista origine dati.

trans-unit.source: Like all <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> helper objects, the XmlDataSourceView defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Come tutti <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>oggetti helper, il XmlDataSourceView definisce le operazioni che l'origine dati è possibile eseguire con i dati sottostanti.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Because the XmlDataSourceView class only overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method, the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control does not support update, insert, or delete operations.
trans-unit.target: Poiché il XmlDataSourceView classe esegue l'override solo di <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>(metodo), associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>controllo non supporta l'aggiornamento, inserimento o le operazioni di eliminazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the XmlDataSourceView class is sealed, you cannot extend the XmlDataSourceView class to add this functionality, but you can derive a data source control from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> and a view from <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> if you require additional functionality.
trans-unit.target: Poiché la classe XmlDataSourceView è sealed, non è possibile estendere la classe XmlDataSourceView per aggiungere questa funzionalità, ma è possibile derivare un controllo origine dati da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>e una visualizzazione dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>se sono necessarie ulteriori funzionalità.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new named instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView"></xref> class, and associates the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> with it.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView"> </xref> classe e associa l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"> </xref> con esso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView"></xref> is associated with.
Retrieves a list of data rows from the underlying XML.
trans-unit.target: Recupera un elenco di righe di dati dai dati XML sottostanti.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object that is used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> oggetto che viene usato per richiedere operazioni sui dati oltre il recupero dei dati di base.
